# Interviewer

## Open Questions

::: {#nte-ex .callout-note title="Open vs Closed"}
Open questions do not restrict the range of possible responses or the type of information to provide.
:::

A

:   anchor: (first code); initial transition prompt to start substantive phase (not necessarily open)

INV

:   initial open-ended invitation

OQ

:   open-ended question (depth and breadth only, see @nte-ex)

## Topic Shift

::: {callout-note title="Code application"}
Code the first prompt in a series of consecutive prompts with the same topic.
:::

C

: context; requests bg info (not a detail the child remembers from a particular time)

-   Suspect

-   People

-   Location

-   Relation
